description: When this bionic is active, you can burn nearly any organic material as fuel (use 'E'), recharging your power level.  Some materials will burn better than others.
Space inside your chest cavity has been surgically converted into a storage area.  You may carry an extra 2 liters of volume.

name: Magnesium Supplements
desc: You took some magnesium supplements.  These will help with sleep deprivation.

description: While sleeping or staying still, it is less likely that monsters will wander close to you.
You had some money stashed at the bank for a rainy day.  Now that the storm is raging, it's a last call to use it maybe?
You needed money and had a big loan in a bank.  Good thing nobody will come to collect it now, right?  Right?
At the time of Cataclysm you were an owner of a fortune stashed in a bank.  Does that have any meaning now?
A strong metal wheel.
A piece of cloth that can be used for cleaning impervious surfaces.
It's dusty.  Has no effect - obsolete fault.

This is an expansion device for use on plutonium-powered equipment.  With enough electronics skill, you could attach this to an atomic tool to double the amount of plutonium it can hold.  Note that this device is incompatible with the atomic battery mod.
While this system is powered, you're able to visually sense your own scent, making it possible for you to recognize your surroundings even in complete darkness.

name: broken centrifuge
description: This used to be a centrifuge, a liquid separating device with an automated analyzer unit.  If it was still functional, it could have been used to analyze a medical fluid sample.

name: broken autoclave
description: This thing is basically an extremely high tech laundry machine or dishwasher.  It seems to not do anything useful anymore.

//: Obsoleted in favor of a furniture version.
name: water dispenser
description: A machine with several taps that dispenses clean water.

name: half-empty shotgun trap
wind turbine rotor assembly
description: A large, bladed turbine meant for generating power from wind.  Spinning idly in the breeze trying to power a grid that's since gone dark, the turbine could be salvaged for local power generation instead.

bash.//: destroy_threshold equal to str_min instead of str_max due to delicate electronics

name: Hand Axes
//: Axe with a short handle, typically wielded in one hand, ocassionally thrown.

text: An electric shock shoots into your hand from %1$s!
